articles.author: Chiranjivi Chakraborty
articles.title: Asian Stocks Slip With US Vote on Knife’s Edge: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian stocks advanced following a slew of positive headlines from China that supported sentiment. The dollar was steady as the clock ticks down to a tight US election.
articles.content:
Asian stocks advanced following a slew of positive headlines from China that supported sentiment. The dollar was steady as the clock ticks down to a tight US election.
